Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the split key parts of a SplitKey object.
        """
kwargs = {'split_key_parts': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'The split key parts must be an integer.',
    secrets.SplitKey, **kwargs)
args = secrets.SplitKey(), 'split_key_parts', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'The split key parts must be an integer.',
    setattr, *args)
